add_subdirectory(Goldfarb_Optimizer)
add_subdirectory(ParamHandler)
add_subdirectory(osqp)
add_subdirectory(JCQP)
add_subdirectory(qpOASES)

set(LCM_ENABLE_JAVA OFF)
set(LCM_ENABLE_LUA OFF)
set(LCM_ENABLE_GO OFF)
set(LCM_ENABLE_EXAMPLES OFF)
set(LCM_ENABLE_TESTS OFF)
add_subdirectory(lcm)
